Package src.components

Class Button

java.lang.Object
src.components.Component
src.components.Button
public class Button extends Component
Extends the Component class with a Textfield and a Runnable action
See Also:
  • Textfield
  • Component

    Description
    Button(int width, int height, int x, int y, String text, Color color)
    Creates a Button with size, location, text and color.
    Button(int x, int y, BufferedImage image)
    Creates a Button with location and image.

  • Constructor Details

    • Button

      public Button(int width, int height, int x, int y, String text, Color color)
      Creates a Button with size, location, text and color.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate for the location
      y - y coordinate for the location
      width - width of the Button
      height - height of the Button
      text - text displayed on the Button
      color - color of the Button

    • Button

      public Button(int x, int y, BufferedImage image)
      Creates a Button with location and image. Takes a previously loaded Image. Size is taken from the image.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate for the location
      y - y coordinate for the location
      image - image of the Button

  • Method Details

    • setLimit

      public void setLimit(int limit)
      Takes a number to set as limitCount variable and sets the limit to true. The limit variable can be used to limit the use of a Button.
      Parameters:
      limit - number to set as limit variable

    • getLimit

      public int getLimit()
      Returns the limit variable. The limit variable can be used to limit the use of a Button.
      Returns:
      limit variable

    • setAction

      public void setAction(Runnable action)
      Takes a Runnable and stores it as action variable
      Parameters:
      action - new action to perform on button click

    • action

      public void action()
      Checks the limit of Button uses (if there is one) and runs the defined action, if the limit is not breached.

    • fill

      public void fill(Color color)
      Takes a color and fills the Button with it.
      Parameters:
      color - new color for the Button

    • updateLabel

      public void updateLabel(String text)
      Takes a String and puts in on the Button
      Parameters:
      text - text to be displayed on the Button

    • actionCheck

      public void actionCheck(Point mousePosition)
      Takes the mouse location and compares it to the buttons corners. If the mouse location is inside the Button, the Buttons action will be perormed.
      Parameters:
      mousePosition - position to compare to the Button
